text: Kendall Jenner has been linked to NBA star Ben Simmons in recent weeks. But on Monday night the 22 - year - old supermodel seemed to have eyes for another fellow - Anwar Hadid, the 18 - year - old younger brother of her best pals Gigi and Bella Hadid. DailyMail. com has obtained an image of the two kissing at a CFDA after party held at Socialista in New York City. New couple? Kendall Jenner and Anwar Hadid were seen kissing at a CFDA after party at Socialista in NYC on Monday evening Same place, same day : Here Kendall is seen walking into the after party, left, and Anwar is pictured at the CFDAs Siblings : Anwar is seen here at the CFDAs with his older sister Gigi, a Vogue
